english.segment1: . Only by your love I am breathless. Only by your touch I am left forever. Longing for your presence and somehow. Abandoned to the mystery I've found
english.segment2: How your majesty once again can. Strike a chord in me. Leaving me surrendered. Knowing I am heaven's. And always worshipping. The love of my life
english.segment3: You are here you are here with me. Everywhere I go you are loving me. I am yours and you are mine. Forevermore
english.segment4: Through the valleys low. You will keep me. O where can I go. Holiness surrounds me. Angels all around me forever. Shadowed your glory I hide
english.segment6: Shadowed your glory forever I hide. You are here you are here with me. Everywhere I go you are loving me. Hallelujah, hallelujah.
